ESP.ORIGINAL: The Essence of PUNGA!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Meshes : clutter\junk\paper01.nif

ESP.ORIGINAL:
My eyes have seen the glory of the mother!
I came to her in her holy grounds and she spoke to me. She warned me to cast the chems away and take up unto her devotion - to seek her children. The Wild Punga!
I took them and I was awaken. No longer did I need buffout for protection. No longer did I need psycho for strength. No longer did I need jet for my agility. All I need is PUNGA! The mother told me so!
I flocked to her knowledge, she filled my head with dreams and her words, and told me I am her prophet and I am to bring the word of punga to the people who are unknowing.
With one last whisper, she told me of her "essence". The "Essence of Punga". She told me I would need some, told me to bring some turpentine too. I took her essence and was filled with a high unlike any other. I re-awoke here, there, and where.
The word of the mighty Punga must be known.
ESP.TRADUIT: 吾目已见母神荣光！; 吾踏足圣地得聆神谕，母命吾弃化学极乐而侍奉其道——寻其子嗣"狂野潘加"; 吾啖圣果而得启示，从此无需壮大灵护体，无需疯狂药壮骨，无需杰特健步，唯需潘加！此乃母神真言！; 吾沐浴神知，母以梦境与箴言灌顶，敕封吾为先知，令吾向蒙昧者布潘加之道; 临终呢喃，母神赐下"潘加之触"，命吾携松节油同往。吾饮圣触而登极乐，神识穿梭时空罅隙; 潘加神威必将广布废土！

ESP.ORIGINAL: PLAYER LOCKED OBJECT
That's locked, and no - I won't help you open it.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep your hands to yourself.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogu_playerlockedobj_0000167f_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: PLAYER PICKPOCKET
Keep your hands to yourself.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogu_playerpickpocke_00001680_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you didn't mean to do that, so just come back over here and we'll sort it out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你不是故意的，回来吧，咱们好好解决。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogu_playerpickpocke_00001681_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be mindful of things that don't belong to you.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogu_playerpickpocke_00001682_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: GREETING
Another visitor? I take it you're here to purchase a Premium Travel Membership? Yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 又来一位？是来买高级旅行会员的吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmoleratq_greeting_00002f54_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If not, I just finished cooking some food for my people - if you would like a helping.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不然的话，我刚给族人做了饭——想蹭一口也行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmoleratq_greeting_00002f54_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Greetings, Traveller.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmoleratq_greeting_00002961_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello again.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmoleratq_greeting_00002f52_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: How may I assist?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmoleratq_greeting_00002f53_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Greetings, Traveller.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001688]1zzDialogueQb) Transportation Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqb_greeting_00001c55_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What brings you to me?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001688]1zzDialogueQb) Transportation Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqb_greeting_00001c57_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Back so soon?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001688]1zzDialogueQb) Transportation Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqb_greeting_00001c56_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: One of our guys got sacked at Nipton, hope Caesar sends an apology soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们有个伙计在尼普顿被开了，希望凯撒赶紧道个歉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Elder [0E002936] (mod) Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqa_greeting_0000168a_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glad the Powder Gangers know not to attack us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 幸好火药帮知道别惹我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Elder [0E002936] (mod) Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqa_greeting_0000168e_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you ever needed to get to Mt. Charleston quick, our Red Rock Transporter knows a shortcut.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想快去查尔斯顿山？红岩运输者知道捷径。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Elder [0E002936] (mod) Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqa_greeting_0000168f_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you ever have any spare RadAway: I'm certain our Searchlight Transporter would buy it off of you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有多余的消辐宁？探照灯运输者会收的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Elder [0E002936] (mod) Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqa_greeting_00001690_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: A few of our babie's escaped the Pueblo the other day, hope they turn up soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前几天几只驮鼠崽子跑出部落了，但愿能找回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Elder [0E002936] (mod) Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqa_greeting_0000168d_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for bringing our babies back. We really appreciate it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢了，把驮鼠崽子带回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Elder [0E002936] (mod) Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqa_greeting_00001694_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand one or two of the babies dying out there, but come on...
ESP.TRADUIT: 一两只驮鼠崽子死在外面我能理解，但这也太……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Elder [0E002936] (mod) Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqa_greeting_00001695_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing beats this job, no-siree.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Elder [0E002936] (mod) Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqa_greeting_00001693_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hope we can find more suitable mates for our Molerats.
ESP.TRADUIT: 盼着给鼹鼠找个好配偶吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Elder [0E002936] (mod) Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqa_greeting_00001692_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Few more days and I'm hitting the road again!
ESP.TRADUIT: 再过几天我又要上路了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Elder [0E002936] (mod) Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqa_greeting_0000168b_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's nice to come home after a few long weeks in the desert.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在沙漠里熬了几周，回家真好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Elder [0E002936] (mod) Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqa_greeting_0000168c_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're hungry you should talk to our Elder, he treats anyone to a full stomach.
ESP.TRADUIT: 饿了就找长老，管你吃饱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Elder [0E002936] (mod) Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqa_greeting_00001689_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not supposed to say this, but we are beginning to offer Premium Travel Memberships. Our Elder can sell you one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 本来不该说，但咱们开始卖高级旅行会员了。长老那儿能买。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Elder [0E002936] (mod) Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqa_greeting_00001691_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hope you know how to disarm that thing.

Would you watch where you're going?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogu_playerknockover_00001678_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The least you can do is pick it up.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogu_playerknockover_00001679_1.wav

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogu_playerknockover_0000167a_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: PLAYER IN IRON SITES
Not the best idea you've had is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是你最好的主意吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogu_playerinironsit_00001675_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hope you miss, for your sake.

ESP.ORIGINAL: HELLO
It's not often we get woman within the Pueblo... That sounded bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 部落里不常有女人来……这话听着不太对。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Elder [0E002936] (mod) Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqa_hello_00001696_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got stopped by one of those elite rangers the other day. Thought I was carrying contraband.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前几天被一个精英游骑兵拦住了，以为我带了违禁品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Elder [0E002936] (mod) Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqa_hello_00001698_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear someone killed Motor-Runner. Hope that means the Fiends wil shoot at us less.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听说有人干掉了摩托跑者，希望恶魔帮少朝我们开枪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No matter what, we will stay strong. We always have.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doesn't matter who takes it. We've been in the Mojave longer than anyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管谁接手，我们在莫哈韦的时间比任何人都长。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogu_1zzhooverdam1_000016bf_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're right, why was I even worried.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wish I had the same outlook as you.

ESP.ORIGINAL: We will persevere; he wasn't our first elder, and he won't be our last.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们会坚持下去；他不是我们的第一位长老，也不会是最后一位。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogu_1zzelderdead1_000016b9_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We need to get all of the transporters together to hold an election for the next elder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们需要召集所有运输者来选举下一位长老。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogu_1zzelderdead1_000016ba_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not sure, but it's such a shame what happened to him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不确定，但发生在他身上的事真是遗憾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogu_1zzelderdead1_000016bb_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay safe, my friend.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogu_1zzelderdead2_000016bc_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope the next one can fill the shoes of the last.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望下一位能继承前任的遗志。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogu_1zzelderdead2_000016bd_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure have, busted my ass right up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然有，摔得我屁股都疼了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogu_1zzmoleratfall1_000016c2_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, who hasn't.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm still trying to recover.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogu_1zzmoleratfall2_000016c6_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's almost like a rite of passage for us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这几乎像是我们的成年礼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogu_1zzmoleratfall2_000016c7_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Probably the Grub n' Gulp, transporters there seem to make good money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能是狼吞虎咽补给站，那里的运输者似乎赚得不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqa_1zzsetup1_000016cd_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mojave Outpost, most definitely. Tons of travellers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫哈韦前哨站，绝对是的。旅客多得很。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqa_1zzsetup1_000016ce_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Novac. Lots of people pour in and out of there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 诺瓦克。人来人往络绎不绝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqa_1zzsetup1_000016cf_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: 188 Trading Post, transporters there barely get to sleep.
ESP.TRADUIT: 188号贸易站，那里的运输者几乎没时间睡觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqa_1zzsetup1_000016d0_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anywhere but Camp Searchlight. Feel bad for the guy set up there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了探照灯营地之外的任何地方。真同情驻扎在那儿的家伙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqa_1zzsetup1_000016d1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ooh thats a good plan.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqa_1zzsetup2_000016d2_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Might have to set up there after you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能得跟着你去那儿设点了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqa_1zzsetup2_000016d3_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was ambushed by some fiends the other week while I had a passenger in tow. Thought it was the end for me, until a ranger started taking heads.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前几周我载客时被几个毒虫伏击，以为要完蛋了，结果游骑兵开始砍人头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqa_1zzstory1_00001caa_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was trying to cut through Quarry Junction on my pack the other week when a pack of Deathclaws starting pursuing. Made it out intact, mostly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前几周想抄近路穿过采石场，结果被一群死亡爪追着跑。勉强全须全尾逃出来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqa_1zzstory1_00001cab_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was bringing a passenger from Freeside to North Vegas the other week. Passenger was drunk and fell off my pack. Hope he made it home safe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前几周从自由城送醉汉去北维加斯，那家伙从我的驮兽上栽下去了。希望他平安到家了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqa_1zzstory1_00001cac_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was heading towards 188 the other week when I heard a shot ring off from Novac. Turned and saw some legionarie without his head. It was midnight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前几周往188号走时，听见诺瓦克传来枪响，回头看见个没脑袋的军团兵——那可是半夜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqa_1zzstory1_00001cad_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was bringing a passenger home the other week. They'd hit it big at one of the casinos. When they got off my pack: they'd left their earnings behind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前几周送个赌场赢大钱的客人回家，结果他把赢的钱全落我驮兽上了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqa_1zzstory1_00001cae_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was moving between Forlorn and Nelson the other week when my pack stepped on a landmine. Thought I had to put her down, happy I didn't.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前几周在福伦和纳尔逊之间运货，驮兽踩到地雷，本打算放弃它，幸好不用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqa_1zzstory1_00001caf_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was almost mistaken for a caravan near Primm the other week. The Powder Gangers let me off, thankfully.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前几周在普里姆附近差点被当成商队，幸亏火药帮放了我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqa_1zzstory1_00001cb0_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was heading through Goodsprings the other week when I was stopped by some Khans. Guess they were looking for some courier. Looked serious.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前几周路过好泉镇被几个大汗帮拦下，他们好像在找什么邮差，阵仗挺吓人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqa_1zzstory1_00001cb1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's insane.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glad you made it home safe.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have hope, one will turn up.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not in Nevada, we tend to have better luck in California.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在内华达不行，我们在加利福尼亚运气更好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqa_1zzbull1_000016b5_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eventually, best we work on raising the pups we have now though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说到底，还是先专心养好现有的幼崽吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqa_1zzbull1_000016b6_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I sure hope you're right.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqa_1zzbull2_000016b7_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We just need to get better at drawing them out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们得学会更好地引它们出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001C48]1zzDialogueQa) Generic Transporter EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqa_1zzbull2_000016b8_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, did you have any?

ESP.ORIGINAL: No way!?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't have any, but my passenger sure did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没带，但乘客肯定带了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't have any chems, no, but I was drunk as shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没带兴奋剂，不过当时醉得像滩烂泥。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Didn't have any chems. Was still scared shitless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么药都没带，照样吓得屁滚尿流。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tired of getting mugged by raiders? Tired of spending your precious time wandering? Are you tired of aching legs and feet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 厌倦了被掠夺者打劫？厌倦了浪费时间四处游荡？受够酸痛的腿脚了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : iTransporter [0E001BD3] (mod) Quest : ([0E001C28]zz1TTWQ) 0E001C28 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\roboteyebot\zz1ttwq_zz1ttweyebotinitia_00001c2f_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mutants looking at you like their next meal? Slavers looking to dress you in a "booming" new accessory?
ESP.TRADUIT: 变种人把你当下一顿美餐？奴隶贩子想给你戴"爆款"新项圈？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : iTransporter [0E001BD3] (mod) Quest : ([0E001C28]zz1TTWQ) 0E001C28 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\roboteyebot\zz1ttwq_zz1ttweyebotinitia_00001c3b_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you a "Big Town" boy trying to find your small town girl?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是"大镇"来的小伙寻找乡下姑娘吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : iTransporter [0E001BD3] (mod) Quest : ([0E001C28]zz1TTWQ) 0E001C28 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\roboteyebot\zz1ttwq_zz1ttweyebotinitia_00001c3c_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you sick of wadding through radiation? Are you sick of tackling the Capital Wasteland with aching feet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 受够在辐射泥浆里跋涉？受够拖着酸痛的脚走遍首都废土？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : iTransporter [0E001BD3] (mod) Quest : ([0E001C28]zz1TTWQ) 0E001C28 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\roboteyebot\zz1ttwq_zz1ttweyebotinitia_00001c3d_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look no further, the Transporters have you covered! Spare your feet from the dread and the misery that IS the Capital Wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别再找了——运输者为您服务！让您的双脚远离废土的恐惧与苦难。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : iTransporter [0E001BD3] (mod) Quest : ([0E001C28]zz1TTWQ) 0E001C28 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\roboteyebot\zz1ttwq_zz1ttweyebotinitia_00001c30_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: From California to DC, the Transporters have you covered. Where do YOU want to go?
ESP.TRADUIT: 从加利福尼亚到华盛顿特区，运输者全程护航。您想去哪儿？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : iTransporter [0E001BD3] (mod) Quest : ([0E001C28]zz1TTWQ) 0E001C28 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\roboteyebot\zz1ttwq_zz1ttweyebotinitia_00001c3e_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The wasteland never rests, and neither do the we! If you need a ride, we got what you need!
ESP.TRADUIT: 废土永不眠，我们也不眠！需要代步工具？我们应有尽有！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : iTransporter [0E001BD3] (mod) Quest : ([0E001C28]zz1TTWQ) 0E001C28 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\roboteyebot\zz1ttwq_zz1ttweyebotinitia_00001c3f_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Arefu, Tenpenny Tower, Megaton, Rivet City, Paradise Falls, Canterbury Commons! We will take you where you need to go!
ESP.TRADUIT: 阿雷夫、十便士塔、兆吨镇、铆钉城、天堂瀑布、坎特伯雷集市！带您抵达任何目的地！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : iTransporter [0E001BD3] (mod) Quest : ([0E001C28]zz1TTWQ) 0E001C28 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\roboteyebot\zz1ttwq_zz1ttweyebotinitia_00001c40_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pricing too steep? Your transporter isn't taking you as far as you would like to go? Purchase a "Premium Travel Membership" to never worry!
ESP.TRADUIT: 觉得价格太高？运输距离不够远？购买"高级旅行会员"永无后顾之忧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : iTransporter [0E001BD3] (mod) Quest : ([0E001C28]zz1TTWQ) 0E001C28 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\roboteyebot\zz1ttwq_zz1ttweyebotinitia_00001c31_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You tired of taking it slow? You wanna go further than ever before? You want to take this to the next level? Purchase a "Premium Travel Membership".
ESP.TRADUIT: 厌倦龟速前进？想突破距离极限？想要更上层楼？立即购买"高级旅行会员"。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : iTransporter [0E001BD3] (mod) Quest : ([0E001C28]zz1TTWQ) 0E001C28 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\roboteyebot\zz1ttwq_zz1ttweyebotinitia_00001c41_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want to change the Wasteland? With every "Premium Travel Membership" purchased, we will donate 10% of the caps to a non-profit organization.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想改变废土？每售出一份"高级旅行会员"，我们将捐赠10%瓶盖给非营利组织。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : iTransporter [0E001BD3] (mod) Quest : ([0E001C28]zz1TTWQ) 0E001C28 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\roboteyebot\zz1ttwq_zz1ttweyebotinitia_00001c42_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for purchasing the "Premium Travel Membership", wastelander.
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢购买"高级旅行会员"，废土客。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : iTransporter [0E001BD3] (mod) Quest : ([0E001C28]zz1TTWQ) 0E001C28 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\roboteyebot\zz1ttwq_zz1ttwpremiumpurch_00001c3a_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a Transporter. I take people and their belongings where they need to go from the safety of my Pack Rat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是运输者，用我的驮兽安全运送人和货物到目的地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001688]1zzDialogueQb) Transportation Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogu_1zzwhatdoyoudo_00001c58_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: My people have trekked these lands longer and better than anyone, we know all the routes and all the shortcuts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们部族穿越这片土地最久也最专业，熟知所有路线和捷径。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001688]1zzDialogueQb) Transportation Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogu_1zzwhatdoyoudo_00001c58_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you?
Where do you wish to go?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001688]1zzDialogueQb) Transportation Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqb_1zztravel_00001c4f_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you take me somewhere?
She comes from a rare breed on the verge of extinction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她属于濒临灭绝的稀有品种
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001688]1zzDialogueQb) Transportation Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogu_1zzaskmolerat_00001c5f_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not long after the bombs fell, there were many of her kind wandering the wastes. People sought them for their large hides and abundant meat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 核爆后废土上曾遍布她的同类，人们猎取厚皮和丰腴肉质
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001688]1zzDialogueQb) Transportation Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogu_1zzaskmolerat_00001c5f_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: My people and I have been fighting for her kind's survival, but they can be awfully hard to mate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们部族为保育它们抗争至今，可惜配种实在太难
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001688]1zzDialogueQb) Transportation Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogu_1zzaskmolerat_00001c5f_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why's your Molerat so big?
My people were once a lowly tribe, called the "Rat Barons".
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们曾是卑微小部落，自称"地鼠领主"
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001688]1zzDialogueQb) Transportation Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogu_1zzasktransport_00001c61_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We got our name from the breeding of rats we attend to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 名字源于世代驯养巨鼠
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001688]1zzDialogueQb) Transportation Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogu_1zzasktransport_00001c61_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We began servicing the Mojave many years ago, before many of these settlements were settled.
ESP.TRADUIT: 早在许多定居点出现前，我们就在莫哈韦跑运输了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001688]1zzDialogueQb) Transportation Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogu_1zzasktransport_00001c61_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about your people.
The grounds that we cover vary from transporter to transporter, we usually cover small areas so we don't compete with eachother too much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每个运输者负责区域不同，划分地盘避免恶性竞争
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001688]1zzDialogueQb) Transportation Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqb_1zzhowfar_00001cba_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We also do this so we can return to our pick-up locations as soon as possible, to lessen the chance of wildlife and ruffians moving into our spots.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么做也能快速返回接客点，防止野兽或匪徒占窝
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001688]1zzDialogueQb) Transportation Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqb_1zzhowfar_00001cba_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If the transporter who's assisting you isn't travelling as far as you'd like, you can see what the next transporter offers if that works for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 若当前运输者路线太短，可找下个运输者协商
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001688]1zzDialogueQb) Transportation Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqb_1zzhowfar_00001cba_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We also offer premium memberships at our Pueblo Manifiesto, our headquarters. If you're interested, seek our Elder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总部普韦布洛曼菲斯托提供高级会员服务，有兴趣找长老
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001688]1zzDialogueQb) Transportation Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult01\1zzdialogueqb_1zzhowfar_00001cba_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: How much distance do you cover per trip?
While we Transporters typically set to do things for ourselves, I do have something a wastelander such as yourself may accomplish.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然运输者习惯自力更生，但有件事适合你这种废土客
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzquesttopic01_00002941_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The molerat pups, our "babies", tend to stick with their birth parents. Naturally.
ESP.TRADUIT: 地鼠幼崽天生黏着亲代
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzquesttopic01_00002941_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Naturally, we trust that the parent molerats keep their flock among them, but sadly that wasn't the case in this situation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 本该由成年鼠管束幼崽，可惜这次出了岔子
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzquesttopic01_00002941_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: A few nights ago, all of the pups abandoned their nest and set out into the wilds. We haven't made any progress in locating them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几晚前所有幼崽离巢出走，至今搜寻无果
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzquesttopic01_00002941_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you need help with anything?
Yes, you are to find the molerat pup and lure them back to the pueblo with banana yucca fruit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，用香蕉丝兰果把幼崽引回普韦布洛
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzquesttopic01_0000294f_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: About that task you sent me to do.
I heard the sounds of their little feet hitting the dirt outside. They won't be getting any banana yucca for a while, that's for certain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听见它们小爪子刨土声，短期内别想吃到香蕉丝兰了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzquesttopic01_00002c4b_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: As I may have said before, I'm paying per head of pup, and you delivered for sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说过按头计费，你确实办到了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzquesttopic01_00002c4b_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope this amount is to your liking. Thank you again, stranger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望酬劳满意，再谢了陌生人
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzquesttopic01_00002c4b_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I brought all of your pups back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我把所有幼崽都带回来了

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard the sounds of their little feet hitting the dirt outside. They won't be getting any banana yucca for a while, that's for certain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听见它们小爪子刨土声，短期内别想吃到香蕉丝兰了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzquesttopic01_00002c4c_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: As I may have said before, I'm paying per head of pup, and while not all of them made it back - I'm happy some of them did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说过按头计费，虽未全数回归，庆幸尚有幸存
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzquesttopic01_00002c4c_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope this amount is to your liking. Thank you again, stranger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望酬劳满意，再谢了陌生人
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzquesttopic01_00002c4c_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I brought some of your pups back, the others didn't make it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带回部分幼崽，其余未能生还

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is terrible news. I hope you atleast tried to prevent their demises. It will take a great while to recoup this loss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噩耗，望你至少尽力阻止死亡，弥补损失需时良久
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzquesttopic01_00002c4d_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: As I may have said before, I'm paying per head of pup, and you brought back one head. Sadly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说过按头计费，可惜只带回一颗头
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzquesttopic01_00002c4d_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope this amount is to your liking.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzquesttopic01_00002c4d_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only one of your pups made it back.
I'm sure no thanks to you. I'm not sure why you even bothered coming to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与你无关，不懂你何必来找我
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzquesttopic01_00002c4e_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave me. I do not wish to even look at you right now.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky

ESP.ORIGINAL: All of your pups died.
I would have you set out to find those delinquents, and lure them back to the confines of the pueblo using sweet banana yucca.
ESP.TRADUIT: 本要你用香甜香蕉丝兰诱回那些叛逆崽子
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzquesttopic02_00002942_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will provide you with what I can, but I do not have much yucca to offer.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzquesttopic02_00002942_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what would you have me do?
I'll take your ill manners as ignorance, but I understand if our way seems strange or even foreign to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 姑且当你无知，理解你对我们传统感到怪异
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzquesttopic03_00002943_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: For many years, the mole rat has been a sigil to our way. There is much to learn from molerats and the way they lead their lives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 地鼠是部族百年图腾，其生存之道蕴含智慧
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzquesttopic03_00002943_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unlike many of the other molerats you may have encountered beyond these walls, ours are domesticated, docile, non-territorial.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与外头野鼠不同，我们的地鼠驯化温顺且无领地意识
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzquesttopic03_00002943_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take the parents for example. They know their place, they stay put and keep the younger generations in check.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以亲代为例，它们安分守己并约束幼崽
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzquesttopic03_00002943_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The pups typically follow suit as they grow, following the customs of their parents. Though sometimes you have a bad litter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 幼崽通常随成长效仿亲代习俗，偶尔出窝劣种
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzquesttopic03_00002943_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Install a gate, that'll solve your problems.
Because such is the way of their predecessors. The pup's parents should have taught them better. They have been punished, they understand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因这是先祖之道，幼崽父母本应管教，它们已受惩戒
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzquesttopic04_00002944_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never uttered trust towards the pups, they earn that when they are old enough to be mounted. They still lack the capacity to be trusted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 幼崽未达骑乘年龄前不值得信任
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzquesttopic04_00002944_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do you trust that the pups stay in the pueblo unsupervised?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为何放任幼崽在普韦布洛乱跑？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because I am not their leader, I hold no power over them. My position is to guide, not to demand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因我非其统治者，职责是引导非命令
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzquesttopic05_0000294c_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: They are gone throughout the year, sometimes weeks - even months at a time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们常年外出，有时数周甚至数月不归
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzquesttopic05_0000294c_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The pueblo is a place for meditation and recovery. It's understandable that they do not wish to chase after skittish runts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 普韦布洛是休憩冥想之所，部族成员不愿追捕逃崽可以理解
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzquesttopic05_0000294c_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why not just have your men find the pups?
Yes, "banana yucca".
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzquesttopic06_00002945_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is solemnly reserved as dessert when they abide by our teachings, their diets usually consist of maize and other vegetables.
ESP.TRADUIT: 遵训时会作为甜点，平日主食是玉米蔬菜
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzquesttopic06_00002945_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: They will follow the yucca, should you have enough to capture their interest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 若有足够丝兰就能吸引它们
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzquesttopic06_00002945_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can provide you some, but you may need to get some of your own. We spent ours on the parents after their punishment for losing their litter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可提供部分，但需自筹——惩戒亲代时用光了库存
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzquesttopic06_00002945_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Banana Yucca?
You cannot beat a baby into submission, they will simply cry. Pups are no different, except for the luxury of having legs to flee with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不能靠殴打驯服幼崽，它们只会哭嚎逃跑。地鼠崽子同理，只不过多四条腿逃命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzquesttopic07_00002946_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, beating them will earn you nothing among them but fear and distrust. You must give them a tangible reason to follow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，靠暴力只会换来恐惧与猜忌。你得给他们实际的追随理由。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzquesttopic07_00002946_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't I just beat them into submission, they'll follow me then will they not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 就不能直接打服他们吗？打到听话自然就跟了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then it is up to you to find more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你就得自己找更多货源。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzquesttopic08_0000294d_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You may find them growing around the Mojave, hopefully with yield. My men have had luck finding or purchasing them within Westside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫哈韦各地或许能找到野生的，西区据点的人倒常能收购到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzquesttopic08_0000294d_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what if I run out of Banana Yucca?
ESP.TRADUIT: 要是香蕉丝兰用完了怎么办？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The breed of molerats we breed are some of the fastest creatures in the wasteland. Fully grown ones are known to out-pace Deathclaws.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们养的地鼠是废土最快的生物，成年个体能跑赢死亡爪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzquesttopic09_0000294e_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unless hunted with firearms, I'm certain that they've found means to feed themselves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要不用枪猎杀，它们自有觅食的法子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzquesttopic09_0000294e_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What if your pups are dead, already?
ESP.TRADUIT: 万一你的幼崽早死了呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excellent, we will talk pay when you return with the pups.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，带回幼崽再谈报酬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzquesttopic10_00002947_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: And please keep in mind that I am paying per head, so be on your best effort to bring them home alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 记住我是按头付费，尽量抓活的回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzquesttopic10_00002947_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It would be in your best interest to search South of the pueblo. All other directions lead to civilization or danger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 建议往普韦布洛南边搜索，其他方向不是人烟就是险地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzquesttopic10_00002947_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll find your molerats.
The Premium Travel Membership allows you to get more out of our transportation service.
ESP.TRADUIT: 高级旅行会员能让运输服务物超所值。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzpremiummembe_00002c47_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It will make all of your trips much cheaper, as well as extend the distance our transporters will take you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所有行程费用打折，运输距离也翻倍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzpremiummembe_00002c47_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The cost is 1000 caps, but if you are a frequent patron of our transportation services, then I highly recommend it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 1000瓶盖入会，常搭车的话强烈推荐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzpremiummembe_00002c47_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's a "Premium Travel Membership"?
I trust you won't be dissatisfied with your purchase.
ESP.TRADUIT: 相信您不会对这笔交易失望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzpremiummembe_00002c48_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, show this to any of our transporters before embarking and enjoy this new luxury.
ESP.TRADUIT: 出示这个给运输者，享受贵宾待遇吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmolerat_1zzpremiummembe_00002c48_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: [1,000 CAPS] I'd like a Premium Travel Membership.
ESP.TRADUIT: [支付1000瓶盖] 我要办高级会员。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That should help in a pinch.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001688]1zzDialogueQb) Transportation Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult03\1zzdialogueqb_1zzhaz01_00002f38_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: One.
This should get me feeling right.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001688]1zzDialogueQb) Transportation Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult03\1zzdialogueqb_1zzhaz02_00002f39_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Two.
That'll help with the blisters.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001688]1zzDialogueQb) Transportation Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult03\1zzdialogueqb_1zzhaz03_00002f3a_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Three.
RadAway we go!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001688]1zzDialogueQb) Transportation Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult03\1zzdialogueqb_1zzhaz04_00002f3b_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Five.
Should be able to pass some out to my lack of patrons.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001688]1zzDialogueQb) Transportation Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult03\1zzdialogueqb_1zzhaz05_00002f3c_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, take all the RadAway I got.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给，我身上消辐宁全拿走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Suit yourself.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001688]1zzDialogueQb) Transportation Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult03\1zzdialogueqb_1zzhaz06_00002f3d_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nevermind.
Hey, hey... It's got it's ups and downs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 害，这鬼地方…总有好有坏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001688]1zzDialogueQb) Transportation Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult03\1zzdialogueqb_1zzhaz00_00002f36_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forecast is always pukey green skies, the radiation keeps me warm and somewhat sick, and the ghouls do wonders for foot traffic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天永远泛着辐射绿，ghoul倒是带来不少客流量。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001688]1zzDialogueQb) Transportation Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult03\1zzdialogueqb_1zzhaz00_00002f36_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It wasn't always bad, it was a quaint little town before this. Was here when it all went to shit. Well, not here, but I was on my way back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以前这儿挺安宁的小镇，灾难降临时我正往回赶——虽然没赶上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001688]1zzDialogueQb) Transportation Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult03\1zzdialogueqb_1zzhaz00_00002f36_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Makes me mention, if you got any spare Radaway - I'll buy it off of you. I can only bum so much off of the NCR patrols.
ESP.TRADUIT: 话说你要有多的消辐宁，我全收。NCR巡逻队的配额根本不够蹭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001688]1zzDialogueQb) Transportation Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult03\1zzdialogueqb_1zzhaz00_00002f36_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like you got the shit end of the stick with this spot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来你抽中了下下签才被派到这破地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice, how much can you fork over?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E001688]1zzDialogueQb) Transportation Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult03\1zzdialogueqb_1zzhaz00_00002f37_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got some RadAway I can sell you.
Ask and you shall recieve.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmoleratq_1zzelderask00_00002f47_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got some questions for you.
We've always made good revenue for ourselves, but the war efforts on both sides has increased our profits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们向来生意不错，两边打仗反而赚更多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmoleratq_1zzelderask02_00002f4a_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It seems that with death and tragedy for some, grows wealth and gain for others.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人家破人亡，就有人盆满钵满，世道如此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmoleratq_1zzelderask02_00002f4a_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The roads are much safer with the NCR and Legion patrolling them, but many people place great mistrust among them. Which brings them to us.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR和军团巡逻让道路安全些，但大伙信不过他们——所以才找我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmoleratq_1zzelderask02_00002f4a_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: How's business been?
The why lies in the mutual respect we have for one another.
ESP.TRADUIT: 答案在于我们彼此的尊重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmoleratq_1zzelderask03_00002f4b_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: They inhabit many mines, caves, cliffs, and wherever else the sun may touch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们栖息在矿洞、悬崖、日照充足处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmoleratq_1zzelderask03_00002f4b_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Being herbivores leads them to travel from place to place, for nowhere has the abundance that they need. They eat and eat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 草食习性让它们四处迁徙，永远吃不饱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmoleratq_1zzelderask03_00002f4b_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the beginning, we began trapping them and only euthanized them when they were crippled or old.
ESP.TRADUIT: 起初我们设陷阱捕捉，只处决老弱病残。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmoleratq_1zzelderask03_00002f4b_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: They are almost akin to puppies when they are young, so eager and full of adventure, and we believe that to domesticate them - is to save them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 幼崽像小狗般活泼亲人，驯化等于拯救。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmoleratq_1zzelderask03_00002f4b_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Much of this sentiment may not be sensible to an outsider, we look to Mole Rat as our children and as they grow; as our protectors; as is our way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 外人或许不解——地鼠是我们的孩子、护卫，更是生存之道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmoleratq_1zzelderask03_00002f4b_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, why Mole Rats?
Yes, but that is because of the Mole Rat, and how their matriarchy is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，这和地鼠的母系社会有关。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmoleratq_1zzelderask04_00002f4c_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mole Rats hate women, or atleast the mothers do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 地鼠仇恨雌性，至少母鼠如此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmoleratq_1zzelderask04_00002f4c_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The females tend to be very territorial with their offspring, thus we need to separate them from their litters, lest chaos will spring.
ESP.TRADUIT: 雌兽护崽时极具攻击性，必须隔离幼崽免生混乱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmoleratq_1zzelderask04_00002f4c_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whether it be dog, cat, human, or rat: the mother will show malice towards female of any species.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论对狗、人还是同类，母兽都敌视雌性生物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmoleratq_1zzelderask04_00002f4c_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Care is not only physical, but emotional as well. And to care for our children, we must remove any negative trigger from their bounds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 养育需身心兼顾，必须隔绝负面刺激。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmoleratq_1zzelderask04_00002f4c_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is our way, our doctrine.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmoleratq_1zzelderask04_00002f4c_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I notice a severe lack of women within your group.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我发现你们队伍里没女人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: One cannot become a transporter through their own desire, they must be found and accepted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 运输者不能自封，需经选拔认可。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmoleratq_1zzelderask05_00002f4d_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those around you were orphaned or sent to us by their familes. From an early age, a transporter learns their lives will differ from others.
ESP.TRADUIT: 周围人都是孤儿或被家族送来，自幼接受不同命运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmoleratq_1zzelderask05_00002f4d_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We are all sworn to celibacy, our children are the Mole Rats.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们立誓独身，地鼠即是子嗣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmoleratq_1zzelderask05_00002f4d_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So to answer your question, no, one cannot "become a Transporter". We are bred.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以答案是不能"成为"运输者，我们生来如此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmoleratq_1zzelderask05_00002f4d_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I become a Transporter?
An elder is chosen once the previous passes on. I accepted this mantle out of necessity alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 长老在前任去世后推举产生，我继任纯属形势所迫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmoleratq_1zzelderask06_00002f4e_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: My role is to guide, teach, and care for those who will be here after me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的职责是引导、教导、守护后继者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmoleratq_1zzelderask06_00002f4e_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you become an Elder?
We seek neutrality. Many of those who reap the wastes have come to accept and acknowledge this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们保持中立，废土各方逐渐承认这点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmoleratq_1zzelderask07_00002f4f_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That isn't to say we are passive, if attacked on the road or within our own pueblo - we will not falter, we will not surrender.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但这不意味软弱——若在运输途中或驻地遇袭，我们绝不退缩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmoleratq_1zzelderask07_00002f4f_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR has tried to form us into a corporation, the Legion has tried to consume us. They have both accepted we can not be harnessed.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR想把我们收编成企业，军团想吞噬我们。但他们都明白——我们无法被驯服。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmoleratq_1zzelderask07_00002f4f_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any issues with other groups within the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和莫哈韦其他势力有矛盾吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmoleratq_1zzelderask08_00002f50_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no more questions for you.
Safe travels.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmoleratq_1zzelderask09_00002f51_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm gonna go...
We began as a lowly tribe known as the "Rat Barons", to when we civilized our tribe's name: no one knows.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们最初叫"地鼠领主"部落，后来文明化了名字——鬼知道怎么改的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmoleratq_1zzelderask01_00002f49_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We spawned out of Idaho, where we learned to domesticate the Molerat. Learned to ride it, and through selective breeding. Grow it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 发源于爱达荷，在那里学会驯化地鼠、骑乘地鼠、选育地鼠。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmoleratq_1zzelderask01_00002f49_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We trekked much of the West and it's coasts atop our mighty four legged children. Much of our kind can be found in any which direction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 骑着四足巨兽穿越西部和海岸，我们的足迹遍布各处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\sd_transporters.esp\1zzmaleadult02\1zzmoleratq_1zzelderask01_00002f49_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We built this "pueblo" from the concepts of housing we came to know throughout California, it's been our home for many decades.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这座普韦布洛按加州建筑风格搭建，住了几十年了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0E002934]1zzMoleRatQ) Molerats In The Sky

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about the Transporters.
Show me what you have for sale.
Since you helped us bring our children back, I've decided to give you half off anything you choose.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I have some food?

You've encountered your first Transporter! You can pay Transporters to bring you to nearby destinations within a certain radius, and can take you even further once you purchase the Premium Travel Pass.
Moleholes have also been added. Moleholes can be traveled to and from, but they must be discovered prior before doing so. Moleholes are scattered throughout the Wasteland. The easiest way to find a Molehole is by being observant; Moleholes give off a greenish smoke signal to make them easier to find.
If you're in the Mojave Wasteland and want the Premium Travel Pass, head to Pueblo Manifesto and speak with the Elder.
**This mod is best experienced with fast-travel disabled. It can be disabled within the SD_Transporters Mod Configuration Menu.**
ESP.TRADUIT:
你遇到了第一位运输者！可支付瓶盖让运输者带你前往附近目的地，购买高级旅行通行证后还能走得更远。
地鼠洞已加入游戏。地鼠洞可双向传送，但需先探索发现。地鼠洞遍布废土，寻找窍门是留意绿色烟雾信号——那是地鼠洞的标志。
若在莫哈韦废土想买高级旅行通行证，前往普韦布洛曼菲斯托找长老。
建议禁用快速旅行以获得最佳体验，可在SD_运输者MOD配置菜单中关闭
